Package it.polimi.softeng.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
This class allows to communicate gameMoves and the start of a game to the Model.

  • Method Details

    • sendGameMove

      public boolean sendGameMove(ArrayList<Cell> tilesToBeRemoved, int column, String requester)
      This method calls model update with information collected by client
      Parameters:
      tilesToBeRemoved - is positions of cell to be removed
      column - is column of insertion
      requester - is receiver of updates

    • startGame

      public void startGame(ArrayList<String> nameList)
      This method manages the game-start setup of the Model (preparation of board, shelfie, PC, CC...) and sends the information to Clients. It also notifies the first player for the beginning of its turn.
      Parameters:
      nameList - of the players

      Notify turn change

    • disconnectionRoutine

      public void disconnectionRoutine(String nickName)
      Accessory method used to send info to the reconnected users; it sends again personal card, common cards, player list with their scores
      Parameters:
      nickName - name of disconnected player that need the infos sent again
